    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [var]                                   1         3
    [stringInStringUnicode]                 5         25
    [=]                                     27        27
    ["${"âˆ†"}"]                              29        36
L2
    [var]                                   1         3
    [stringInStringNewline]                 5         25
    [=]                                     27        27
    ["${"\\n"}"]                            29        37
L3
    [var]                                   1         3
    [nestedInterpolation]                   5         23
    [=]                                     25        25
    ["${"${"\\n"}"}"]                       27        40
L4
    [var]                                   1         3
    [interpolationWithMethodCall]           5         31
    [=]                                     33        33
    ["${foo("")}"]                          35        46
EOF
